Judul: EFFECTSOFNONLINEARITY ONTRANSIENT PROCESSES IN AT-CUT QUARTZ THICKNESS-SHEAR RESONATORS
Abstrak:
We study the effects of mechanical nonlinearity arising fromlarge thickness-shear de-
formation on the transient process of an AT-cut quartz plate resonator. Mindlin’s two-dimensional
plate equation is used, from which a system of first-order nonlinear differential equations govern-
ing the evolution of the vibration amplitude is obtained. Numerical solutions by the Runge-Kutta
method show that in common operating conditions of quartz resonators the nonlinear effect varies
from noticeable to significant. As resonators are to be made smaller and thinner in the future
with about the same power requirement, nonlinear effects will become more important and need
more understanding and consideration in resonator design.
Kata Kunci: quarts resonator, thickness-shear mode, transient processes, nonlinear effect,Mindlin’s plate equation
Sumber: Acta Mechanica Solida Sinica, Vol. 28, No. 4, August, 2015
